name: Sensitive
overview: A single player, puzzle shareshareware game created by Chris N. Benton and released in 1992, in it, you are in control of a white and blue blob, which has to cross a series of tiles to reach the exit. When you cross a yellow tile it is destroyed and all yellows MUST be destroyed to move on to the next level. You cannot pass over water (blue tiles), while a green square must be passed over twice. T squares are teleporters, grey tiles are stone and will not break or disappear. direction tiles only allow passage in the indicated directions. Get to the exit!
